title: The Drama of The Promo (feat. Dan St. Germain)
description:
Dan St. Germain joins The Bonfire to co-host with Dan while Jay heads up to Montreal and the guys explore the lifetime movie style of the new Ric Flair wrestling promo.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM
